# CORE — MONO 02 (core-mono-02)

## One-line pitch
Mono 02 — Soft tones with visual product focus

## Pricing
- CORE line — 350,000 KRW (launch)
- Regular — 390,000 KRW

## Included pages
- main.html
- product_list.html
- product_detail.html
- member_login.html
- lookbook.html

## 3 Brand Mood Examples Included
**ARCHIVE STUDIO**  
Structured minimal studio tone. Bright beige palette with calm precision.  
**SILENT FORM**  
Muted neutral minimalism. Weighted tone with restrained emotion.  
**MONO HOUSE**  
Typography-first, graphic contrast. Pure black and white clarity.

## Same structure. Different identity.
같은 모듈 구조와 레이아웃을 유지하면서 브랜드 톤과 무드를 바꾸는 방식으로 확장할 수 있습니다.

## Versatility
- Minimal bright brand
- Neutral calm brand
- Typography-focused brand

## Core features
- Desktop sticky PDP purchase area
- Mobile fixed bottom CTA
- Cart drawer with safe fallback
- Option Button UI
- Responsive optimized
- Clean module structure

## Customization guide
- tokens.css에서 폰트·컬러·라운드·그리드 변경
- variant-config.json의 layout 옵션 조정

## Update policy
- 6개월 무료 업데이트

## Support scope
- 버그 수정 및 Cafe24 모듈 호환성 확인

## Changelog
- v1.0.0 초기 출시
